ruling: - For the effect of [[A Rival Appears!]], refer to the levels of the monster on the field and the monster in the hand at the time [[A Rival Appears!]] resolves (for purposes of [[Cost Down]], [[Level Conversion Lab]], [[Mystical Space Typhoon]] in a chain destroying [[Demotion]], etc.)
- If the opponent's monster is face-down or not on the field when [[A Rival Appears!]] resolves, then its effect disappears.
- If you do not have a monster of the same level as the target, you cannot activate [[A Rival Appears!]]
